articles.title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization

learning_outcomes: Understand the importance of AI localization for global adoption
Learn how to adapt AI models to local languages and cultures
Recognize the challenges of ensuring safety in AI localization
strategic_questions: How can AI localization balance the need for cultural sensitivity with the risk of compromising safety standards?
What are the potential consequences of failing to adapt AI models to local contexts?
How can organizations prioritize AI localization while ensuring that their models remain aligned with global safety and ethical standards?

learning_outcomes: Understand the importance of trust-based frameworks in AI safety
Learn about the concept of safeguards against misuse in AI
Recognize the need for access control in AI capabilities
strategic_questions: How can trust-based frameworks be effectively implemented in AI systems?
What are the potential risks and benefits of expanding access to frontier cyber capabilities?
How can organizations balance the need for access control with the need for innovation in AI?

articles.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis

learning_outcomes: Understand how large language models can be applied to biotechnology
Learn about the potential of autonomous labs in reducing costs
Recognize the role of closed-loop experimentation in optimizing processes
strategic_questions: How can large language models be further integrated into biotechnology workflows?
What are the potential limitations and challenges of autonomous lab automation?
How might the cost savings from autonomous labs impact the biotechnology industry?

learning_outcomes: understand the capabilities of GPT-5.3-Codex
recognize the advancements in agentic coding models
comprehend the integration of reasoning in LLMs
strategic_questions: How will the integration of reasoning capabilities in LLMs impact the future of coding?
What are the potential applications of agentic coding models like GPT-5.3-Codex?
How will the development of more advanced LLMs influence the coding industry?

prerequisites.name: Basic understanding of Large Language Models

learning_outcomes: Understand the concept of Codex-native agents and their capabilities
Recognize the potential applications of long-horizon technical work in real-world scenarios
Appreciate the role of general reasoning in Large Language Models
strategic_questions: How can Codex-native agents like GPT-5.3-Codex impact the future of technical work?
What are the potential limitations and challenges of using LLMs for long-horizon technical tasks?
How can general reasoning capabilities be further developed and improved in LLMs?

learning_outcomes: understand the importance of AI governance in enterprise settings
learn about the key features of OpenAI Frontier
understand how AI agents can be managed and deployed
strategic_questions: How can AI governance be balanced with innovation in enterprise settings?
What are the potential applications of AI agents with shared context?
How might OpenAI Frontier impact the development of AI solutions in various industries?

articles.title: Unlocking the Codex harness: how we built the App Server

learning_outcomes: Understand how to embed the Codex agent using the Codex App Server
Learn about the capabilities of the bidirectional JSON-RPC API
Grasp the importance of tooling in AI infrastructure
strategic_questions: How can the Codex App Server be applied to other AI agent use cases?
What are the implications of using a bidirectional JSON-RPC API for AI tooling?
What are the potential limitations of the Codex App Server architecture?
